markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Kayalini](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1683)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Travel Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=141) pg. 103</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) This animal can be purchased as a pet, but cannot be combat trained or contribute to combat in any way._

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Originally brought to Absalom by [kayals](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=30) fleeing the [Shadow Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=11), kayalinis are shy creatures made from shadow. They resemble small [monkeys](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1685) with reptilian features like claws, short horns, and long, shadowy tongues. When in a new home, they tend to hide under beds or in closets. Around people they trust, they'll sit quietly on a lap for hours.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Kayalini

They resemble small monkeys with reptilian features like claws, short horns, and long, shadowy tongues. When in a new home, they tend to hide under beds or in closets.
